column1: Finally, the glc7 - 10 - induced mitotic arrest is abolished in spindle checkpoint mutants, suggesting that defects in kinetochore - microtubule interactions caused by hyperphosphorylation of kinetochore proteins activate the spindle checkpoint.

PIG - M has a functionally important DXD motif, a characteristic of many glycosyltransferases, within a domain facing the lumen of the endoplasmic reticulum ( ER), indicating that transfer of the first mannose to GPI occurs on the lumenal side of the ER membrane.
